appScreenCarAutoModeCrash: Auto mode: Car crash! Switching over to manual control. Good luck!
appScreenCarAutoModeParking: Cars move back to initial position
appScreenDemoModeEnterDialogText: You can leave demo mode by touch/click and hold or using the ‚ÄúEscape‚Äù key.
appScreenTeamplayChatNoEmojis: Emojis might not be supported on your device.
appScreenTeamplayChatNone: No messages yet. Write something nice‚Ä¶
appScreenTeamplayConnectionError: Error: Couldn't connect or connection lost
appScreenTeamplayGameStart: Using the ‚Äústart‚Äù button will start the game as soon as you and each teammate clicked the button. As soon as anyone clicks the button it is impossible to join for further teammates. Currently {{0}} player(s) (including you) joined the game.
appScreenTeamplayJoinError: Couldn't join. Game is full or obsolete
appScreenTeamplayNoWebsocket: Can't load multiplayer functions - please update your browser
appScreenTeamplaySetupStart: Invite your teammate(s) using the following link
appScreenTeamplayTeammateReady: Your teammate is ready. Are you, too
appScreenTeamplayTeammateWait: Please wait for teammate to get ready‚Ä¶
errorScreenErrorAnimateGeneralPs: An error with the animation web worker thread occurred. Either it couldn't be registered or a runtime error occurred. Is your browser up to date?
errorScreenErrorMissingPicsPs: You might have problems with your internet connection, firewall or media blocker.
If there is a problem with the server delivering the image, you will have to wait for us to fix it.
errorScreenErrorTeamplayConnectionPs: If you can't establish a connection to the game server, it can have multiple reasons. First of all make sure, you are connected to the Internet, use a modern browser and an up-to-date version of MOROway App.
If following these steps does not help there might be a server problem. If so, try again later.
errorScreenErrorTeamplayJoinPs: If you can't join a game, it might be full, obsolete or already running. Please create a new game.
errorScreenErrorTeamplayUpdatePs: You have to update to the newest version of MOROway App.
generalServerNoteInfoLater: Only works if this message remains valid.
helpScreenContactFeedbackPs: Get in touch using the contact info displayed below.
helpScreenDownloadAppsAndroidPs: You can download this app via Google Play Store or F-Droid.
helpScreenDownloadAppsLinuxPs: You can download this app to your Laptop / PC via Ubuntu's Snap Store.
helpScreenDownloadAppsWindowsPs: You can download this app to your Windows Laptop / PC via Microsoft Store.
helpScreenDownloadViewSourcePs: Get the source code from GitHub.
helpScreenGeneralCarsPs: By touching / clicking one of the three cars left to the main station it starts. By touching and holding / double-clicking one of them they enter automatic mode, which means they navigate automatically.
If you haven't enabled automatic mode and operate more than one car, you risk a head-on collision. If this happens touch and hold / double-click one of the involved cars to move it back.
Touching or clicking on a stopped car's parking lot will navigate it back there.

You may access a car control center by touching with three fingers / right-clicking the background of the train control center. Alternatively you may use the options menu icon below the virtual model railroad.
helpScreenGeneralGesturesPs: To zoom in and out you have several options: ‚Äúcontrol‚Äù-key + ‚Äú+‚Äù/‚Äú-‚Äù, ‚Äúcontrol‚Äù-key + mouse wheel and the pinch touch gesture.
To change the zoom display detail you may use the arrow keys or click/touch the background, hold and move.
The reset the zoom factor you may use the ‚Äúcontrol‚Äù-key + ‚Äú0‚Äù or double-touch on the background.
In the 3D-view you can also tilt the view by using the ‚Äúcontrol‚Äù-key + an ‚Äúarrow‚Äù-key, click and hold the mouse wheel + move the mouse or moving two fingers parallel (touch only).
In the 3D-view you can reset the tilt by double-click or touch and hold on the black area next to the game.
helpScreenGeneralTeamplayPs: If you wish to play together with your friends use the multiplayer mode.
First you have to choose a nickname.
Now a new game is created and the link can be shared with up to three friends. Please note: Closing the app will destroy the game. The link expires after a while.

After your teammate(s) joined you should touch / click ‚Äústart‚Äù and the game will start as soon as all your teammates touched / clicked the button. If you invited more than just one teammate, do not start the game before everyone joined, because after you or a teammate pressed the button nobody can join anymore.
Now all actions are synced and you can play together. Furthermore a text chat is available.
helpScreenGeneralTrainsPs: You may operate seven trains: a steam engine, two high speed trains, a railbus, a local train, a street car and an American freight train. Start or stop a train by touching / clicking on it. Touch and hold / double-click a train to change it's direction.
To navigate by using ‚ÄúClassic UI‚Äù, select a train by touching / clicking on the button on the lower-left side. Start or stop the selected train by operating the transformer.
On larger devices you are also able to control the trains's speed using the transformer. Small devices use a medium speed, but you may zoom in on the transformer to avoid this restriction.
To change a train's direction use the arrow symbol in the lower right corner of the transformer; this is not possible on small devices.
For trains turned around using the turning loop the direction display needs to be read inverted everywhere.
You may turn some switches. Touch / click and hold the background to located the switches. Touch / click on a switch to turn it. The train takes the red or green colored way.
You may access a train control center by touching with three fingers / right-clicking the background. Alternatively you may use the options menu icon below the virtual model railroad.
helpScreenGeneralWelcomePs: Hello, you use MOROway App. The background image is a aerial view of the MOROway model railroad taken 2011. The central sidings have been newly taken in 2021 to make them usable. Enjoy!

optDesc_morowayApp_alwaysShowSelectedTra: Displays the name of the selected train.
optDesc_morowayApp_burnTheTaxOffice: Shows some animations on the burning building.
optDesc_morowayApp_classicUI: Displays control elements like transformer and train selection button.
optDesc_morowayApp_cursorascircle: Replaces the cursor with a colored circle.
optDesc_morowayApp_reduceOptMenu: Allows to hide non-essential options menu items. If this setting is activated, the items crossed out below will not be displayed.
optDesc_morowayApp_saveGame: Saves the game's current state for the next game.
optDesc_morowayApp_startDemoMode: Directly enter demo mode on app start.
optInfo_morowayApp_alwaysShowSelectedTra: Requires ‚ÄúClassic UI‚Äù. Does not work on small screens.
optInfo_morowayApp_cursorascircle: Does not work on touch screens. Requires 2D-view.
optInfo_morowayApp_showNotifications: Some notifications are shown even if deactivated. Does not work on some display aspect ratios.
optInfo_morowayApp_startDemoMode: You can leave demo mode by touch/click and hold or using the ‚ÄúEscape‚Äù key.
optLangSelectChange: Preferences saved - reload app to apply
